doc.field: American Board of Commissioners of Foreign Missions annual meeting book
American Board of Commissioners of Foreign Missions annual meeting book

Volume from the 61st annual meeting of the American Board of Commissioners of Foreign Missions in Brooklyn, N.Y., containing a list of corporate members and meeting attendees, as well as information on attendees' states of residence and who they stayed with while in Brooklyn.

Volume from the 61st annual meeting of the American Board of Commissioners of Foreign Missions in Brooklyn, N.Y., containing a list of corporate members and meeting attendees, as well as information on attendees' states of residence and who they stayed with while in Brooklyn.
American Board of Commissioners for Foreign Missions
American Board of Commissioners for Foreign Missions
American Board of Commissioners for Foreign Missions

Volume from the 61st annual meeting of the American Board of Commissioners of Foreign Missions in Brooklyn, N.Y., containing a list of corporate members and meeting attendees, as well as information on attendees' states of residence and who they stayed with while in Brooklyn.
The American Board of Commissioners of Foreign Missions was founded in 1810 to support foreign missionary efforts. The 61st annual meeting of the Board was held in Brooklyn, N.Y. in October of 1870.
Gift of H.H. McFarland, 1872. Formally accessioned in 1977.
